title: Introducing: Mïrändä
content:
NY’s Mïrändä makes quite the impression with her debut EP, Empire, released at the end of last week.

Playing with elements of dream-pop merged with more intense, almost trance leaning moments, it’s a delicately atmospheric and blossoming listen. Opener, Memoria feels like it should be lifted straight from a retrospectively slightly cheesy 80’s cult film, whilst EP centre piece, Cruel 2 B Kind is blistering energetic and unrelenting – part Depeche Mode, part Grimes.
